mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorial rotunda and bust of Lincoln by George Grey Barnard, 1921

As a museum and memorial, the Lincoln Memorial Shrine seeks to deepen the understanding of President Abraham Lincoln and the American Civil War and its impacts on generations of Americans through education, interaction, exhibition, and research. -- https://www.lincolnshrine.org/history/ [work]
